title: ADA buyers collection
description: Long time ADA stay at Low price range.

f6_assessments.q0:
Proposal is very vague and lacks details. 

-Does not define how it will attract new proposers 
-Does not define how it will result in new proposal on Catalyst
f6_assessments.q1: Too vague to be able to assess successful implementation.
f6_assessments.q2: Barely any information presented, no KPIs, no basic description of project, nothing to audit.

f6_assessments.q0: Hi you are not at all adressing the challenge: How can we encourage entrepreneurs from outside the Cardano ecosystem to submit proposals to Catalyst in the next two funds?
f6_assessments.q1: It cant be successfull as it does not adress the challenge.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal does not contain any details on what exactly ahould be implemented(just stating a tool should be implemented is too little)

f6_assessments.q0: The problem statement doesn't present a reasonable problem. Draft proposal. The proposal is not within the scope of the challenge. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q1: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for feasibility assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.
f6_assessments.q2: Draft proposal. There is not enough information for auditability assessment. I would recommend using the Catalyst documentation as a reference for a new proposal, more precisely the document proposal writing guide in the FAQ section on the IdeaScale Catalyst homepage.

f6_assessments.q0:
Has the problem needing to be solved been identified and articulated?
 There is no problem stated. There is a statement which is not defined as a problem.


Does this proposal fall within the scope of the challenge brief?
No
 

Does this proposal show clearly how it will add value to the Cardano System?
No 
 

Have key metrics and goals of the proposal been stated clearly 
No



Do the key metrics and goals of the proposal fall within the scope of the challenge
No 

Can the proposal scale to address future challenges?
No as there is no proper proposal
f6_assessments.q1:
Has the proposer provided evidence (references, links, etc.) of relevant skills and experience needed to implement the proposal?
No team members or profiles are listed.   
 
Are these links sufficient?
No 
 
Have you the CA visited these links and contacted the relevant people? 
None


Have you been able to assess their level of competence?
There is no way to asess this 

Does proposer know, in an identifiable manner, the type and number of team members required to implement the proposal?
 None listed

Has he rationally and logically laid out his team structure and breakdown?
No 


Has budget been outlined clearly and broken down into identifiable items?
No only a single figure of 250 is given

IS budget reasonable to achieve the set goals?
Unknown 

Has the proposer provided a verifiable plan if additional funding is required to implement the proposal?
No 

Have you verified this plan?
Nothing to verify 


Does proposal offer a realistic timetable to complete the work?
NO 


Does the proposal provide a sensible and conductible plan for implementation that shows not only what is being done but also how?
No


Does the plan describe the resources necessary to implement the proposal?
No 
 


Does the proposal clearly explain  technical aspects like architecture, language and technologies if they are crucial for implementation?
No 

Has the proposer considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation?
No
f6_assessments.q2:
Is there clearly laid out a roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement.
No

Are there clearly defined Metrics/KPIs that define the success of the proposal?
No


Is there a clear understandable description of the targeted problem?
No

 

Is there a clear understandable solution that addresses the problem?

No
 

Has the proposer identified possible hurdles, challenges and difficulties?
No

 
How does the proposer plan to deal with these difficulties?
No plans given
 

Are there contingency plans in place for various outcomes?
No

There are no details on the proposers plan or solution therefore I cannot recommend this proposal at all. It has no team members, no plan, no roadmap, no budget other than a single figure.

f6_assessments.q0: the proposal is not fitting to the fund section + the objective is unclear.
f6_assessments.q1: the experience provided is not sufficient, more information is missing.

solution: I think it's better to arrange long term stacking project for ADA with a new app.
experience: I have 1 year of cryptocurrency investment experience. But that projects have too many problems regarding transparency.
